about_the_game:
Become the Boss of Your Own TV Studio - Create the Shows of Your Dreams!

TV Show Tycoon is a text-based tycoon game where you can live out your TV mogul fantasies. In the game, you will run your very own TV studio - craft exciting new shows from the ground up, then strategically release them across various platforms to grow your fanbase. Navigate through the industry and make your choices for the events you will face!

---

Detailed Creator
TV Show Tycoon's robust show creator lets you shape your productions with a ton of creative freedom. Mix and match countless elements to truly make each series reflect your unique vision. Customize every aspect of your productions, from broad genres to specific stylistic flourishes. Specifically adjust the prominence of elements such as fight scenes!

Responsive Game
Your creative decisions won't exist in a bubble - the game will closely monitor how your audiences and critics respond. With nearly 8250 unique review pieces, TV Show Tycoon was tailored to respond to your design choices! Earn praise for smart decisions, and adapt when the feedback calls for it. Be careful as the audience might not be so polite about it sometimes!

Strategic Gameplay
Your choices will often affect how your show will do once it is released. Be careful about the nuances of your target audiences, your show and of course your network. Is it a TV Channel or an Online Platform? What is their episode strategy? How much do they charge for subscription? Ensure your content finds its perfect home. The platform with the most crowded audience might not always be the best option!

Simple Management
Expand your operations by building your own production and effects facilities. Wisely hire talented directors, writers, and other industry professionals to elevate the quality of your content.

Random Events
As you play, you'll sometimes encounter random events and event chains that may present tough choices. Make alliances with powerful networks, or get your hands dirty with some industry backroom deals - the decisions are yours.

Database Editor
You can create your own databases with the game's database editor! Create your own characters, networks, topics, themes and pick which databases you want in-effect in the game! Or install databases made by other people!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Get in charge of your own TV Show Company in this text-based tycoon game! Have you ever thought of your own TV Show? Design your dream shows down to the small details. Release your shows and witness your audience comment on your design choices! Make money and release more shows and seasons!
